cu.explanation_en: Setting Num_Threads_PUSCH to 0 is below the valid minimum (typically 1 or more) and will cause PUSCH processing thread configuration errors leading to uplink data handling failures.

du.explanation_en: Setting physCellId to 1008 exceeds the valid range (0-1007) and will cause physical cell ID configuration errors leading to cell identification failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將 physCellId 設定為 1008 超過有效範圍（0-1007），會導致物理細胞 ID 配置錯誤並造成細胞識別失敗。
